name: Cross Border Benefits Alliance - Europe
goal: The Cross Border Benefits Alliance - Europe (CBBA-Europe) is a new Brussels based AISBL aiming to promote the creation of cross border employee benefits in Europe (including cross border/pan-European pension funds, healthcare plans, unemployment benefits programs, etc.).
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
The implementation of the new IORP Directive (pension funds directive);
Legislative proposal for a new Pan European Personal Pension Product (PEPP)
EIOPA's consultations about the creation of a new EU legal framework for a pan-European DC occupational DC pension
Capital Markets Union (CMU) implementation
